About Kirikiri Z

　Kirikiri Z is a Kirikiri 2 fork project that aims to support Kirikiri's VC build, remove legacy features, and add modern features.
　See TJS2 Help for the syntax of TJS2.
　Here we will focus on the Kirikiri class.
